result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ga: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.html: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé tinn mar sin níorḃ ḟéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: How does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ga: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil

result.ponchtml: Conas a ullṁaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taoḃ amuiġ den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?

result.ga: Cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990
result.orig: Cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990
result.html: Cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990The school was founded in 1990.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ an scoil ar bun i 1990The school was founded in 1990.

result.eng: I left school full of hopes.
result.ga: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.orig: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.html: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchaisI left school full of hopes.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóċaisI left school full of hopes.

result.eng: My favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ga: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.orig: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.html: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ponchtml: Is í an ṁatamaitic an t-áḃar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.

result.eng: They teach languages in this school.
result.html: Múintear teangacha sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.
result.ponchtml: Múintear teangaċa sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.orig: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.html: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair mé léi ó d'ḟág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a ḃí sí seaċt mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: The school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.
result.ga: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.orig: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.html: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliainThe school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.

result.html: Tá na páistí ar scoilThe children are at school.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí ar scoilThe children are at school.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.

result.eng: The two of them are at school.
result.ga: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil

result.ponchtml: Tá an ḃeirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.

result.eng: Do you play music at school?

result.eng: What time do you leave school?

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil

result.eng: He hated school and books with a passion.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra

result.html: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhraHe hated school and books with a passion.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
